name: Exeggutor

attacks.name: Teleport
attacks.text: Switch Exeggutor with 1 of your Benched Pok√©mon.

attacks.name: Big Eggsplosion
attacks.text: Flip a number of coins equal to the number of Energy attached to Exeggutor. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

flavorText: Legend has it that on rare occasions, one of its heads will drop off and continue on as an Exeggcute.

strengths: Big Eggsplosion scales with energy - high damage potential
Only costs 1 Colorless energy to attack
synergies: Energy acceleration - More flips for Big Eggsplosion
Any energy type - Colorless attack cost

competitiveHistory: Exeggutor was occasionally used for Big Eggsplosion's high ceiling. With multiple energy attached, it could deal massive damage, but the coin-flip variance made it unreliable for competitive play.

rulings.ruling: Big Eggsplosion flips coins equal to ALL energy attached to Exeggutor, regardless of type.
Double Colorless Energy counts as 1 Energy card for determining number of coin flips.
Teleport can only be used if you have Benched Pokemon to switch with.
